page.title: 11FARMING AROUND ARBROATH
page.content: {Farming}in area is mostly livestock and crops.The farmers employ people from Arbroath and the surrounding district to help around the farms.In the summer the farmers employ people to pick their berries and in the Autumn they get people to their potatoes.Most of the work nowadays is done by machinery so there is not as much{employment}for the local people on the farms as there was in the past.Some of the farms sell their produce to factories and companies far away.Some of the farmers have their own{transport}to save costs.The crops grown are wheat,barley,potatoes,raspb- erries,and grass crops for stock.Recently oil rape seed has been grown.This is because E.E.C. regulations have made {trade }in this crop more profitable.
